name: Defender Horn I
description: A horn crafted especially to fight off calamity. Modified so that anybody can use it.

name: Champion Horn
description: A fortified horn designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Champion Horn II
description: A fortified horn designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Champion Horn III
description: A fortified horn designed for Rampage defense. It responds to one's desire to protect.

name: Guardian Horn
description: Used by village defenders, this horn fortifies one's power to protect like castle walls.

name: Kamura Chorus II
description: A Kamura-made hunting horn that uses blades to produce a chiming chorus.

name: Kamura Chorus I
description: A Kamura-made hunting horn that uses blades to produce a chiming chorus.

name: Kamura Chorus III
description: A Kamura-made hunting horn that uses blades to produce a chiming chorus.

name: Kamura Chorus IV
description: A Kamura-made hunting horn that uses blades to produce a chiming chorus.

name: Kamura Chorus V
description: A Kamura-made hunting horn that uses blades to produce a chiming chorus.

name: Kamura Ninja Horn
description: Rumor has it that if you hear this horn's melody, death is soon to follow.

name: Kamura Warrior Flute
description: Rumor has it that if you hear this horn's melody, death is soon to follow.

name: Kamura Warrior Flute+
description: Rumor has it that if you hear this horn's melody, death is soon to follow.

name: Duke's Grail
description: A hunting horn forged from salvaged materials. Its melodies are both innocent and mysterious.

name: Fine Kamura Flute
description: Conviction swells amid dulcet tones as memories of a fiery hero stir.

name: Magician's Allure
description: The enchanting music from this magical instrument mesmerizes all who hear its sweet melodies.

name: Poetic Bell I
description: An elegant bell left by a famous military strategist. Its clear tone brings death.

name: Poetic Bell II
description: An elegant bell left by a famous military strategist. Its clear tone brings death.

name: Summoning Bell
description: An enhanced Poetic Bell. Its elegant sound cleanses souls before their crossing.

name: Sublime Bell
description: Disaster avaunt! Blight begone! Beautiful bell, ring out eternally!

name: Summoning Bell+
description: An enhanced Poetic Bell. Its elegant sound cleanses souls before their crossing.

name: Sublime Bell I
description: A hunting horn that emits a sublime chime, almost as if summoning something...

name: Sublime Bell+
description: Disaster avaunt! Blight begone! Beautiful bell, ring out eternally!

name: Sublime Bell II
description: A hunting horn that emits a sublime chime, almost as if summoning something...

name: Araknahorn
description: Don't be fooled by the sweet sound; it brings only misery and despair.

name: Araknatootle
description: A horn that plays notes of pure destruction, erasing the future, erasing hope.

name: Garance Toll
description: This bell's warm chimes conjure hope of a brighter future, until it beckons the crimson dusk...

name: Doomed Bell
description: A Rakna-Kadaki hunting horn. It echoes with the sounds of despair and hatred.

name: Basarios Rock I
description: A prototype weapon made of Basarios. Uses vibrating strings to produce sound.

name: Gigant Rock
description: An enhanced Basarios Rock. Its new mechanism induces wild frenzies in listeners.

name: Kampa Da Lavater
description: This bell rings with a ceaseless, burning passion, scorching all until the inevitable end of days.

name: Garance Toll+
description: This bell's warm chime conjures dreams of a brighter future, until it beckons the crimson dusk...

name: Basarios Rock Mk.II
description: A prototype weapon made of Basarios. Uses vibrating strings to produce sound.

name: Gigant Rock+
description: An enhanced Basarios Rock. Its new mechanism induces wild frenzies in listeners.

name: Titan's Rock
description: This Basarios hunting horn has been modified to create low-pitch sounds.

name: Usurper's Growl I
description: A horn filled with a monarch's wrath. Play it to release his fighting spirit.

name: Usurper's Growl II
description: A horn filled with a monarch's wrath. Play it to release his fighting spirit.

name: Despot's Thunderclap+
description: An enhanced Usurper's Growl; the monarch's roar destroys any who oppose him.

name: Zurogong Primo I
description: A horn made from Arzuros parts. Its dulcet tones echo out across the mountains.

name: Oppressor's Boon
description: When the roar of a Zinogre and the beat of the heavens ring out, it shakes the earth to its core.

name: Zurogong Primo II
description: A horn made from Arzuros parts. Its dulcet tones echo out across the mountains.

name: Zurogong Secundo
description: The Zurogong Primo's final form. Its sound reverberates with the mountains' voices.

name: Zurogong Secundo+
description: The Zurogong Primo's final form. Its sound reverberates with the mountains' voices.

name: Zurogong Tertio
description: This horn's melodies inspire the hearts of those who hear it and bring about victory in battle.

name: Striped Dragonga I
description: A hunting horn made from Tigrex materials. The fierce wyvern roar shakes the soul.

name: Tigrex Horn+
description: The Striped Dragonga's final form. Its riotous roar will shake the earth beneath you.

name: Striped Dragonga II
description: A hunting horn made from Tigrex materials. The fierce wyvern roar shakes the soul.

name: Tigrex Horn
description: The Striped Dragonga's final form. Its riotous roar will shake the earth beneath you.

name: Tigrex Roar
description: The beat of this Tigrex drum turns hunter to hero and heralds victory in battle.

name: Tigrex Roar+
description: The beat of this Tigrex drum turns hunter to hero and heralds victory in battle.

name: Bariguiro I
description: A horn that rubs Barioth tusk and plate together to create a hellish symphony.

name: Bariguiro II
description: A horn that rubs Barioth tusk and plate together to create a hellish symphony.

name: Algiguiro
description: Enhanced Bariguiro. Play it once, and ice and snow will react, dancing beautifully.

name: Guiro Frula+
description: A new Barioth hunting horn. Play it once, and ice and snow will react, dancing beautifully.

name: Guiro Frula
description: A new Barioth hunting horn. Play it once, and ice and snow will react, dancing beautifully.

name: Frigiguiro
description: A Barioth horn stemming from native ice folk's tradition. It musters mighty blizzards.

name: Frilled Flute I
description: A horn made from Somnacanth parts. Its tones can raise even the lowest of spirits.

name: Frilled Flute II
description: A horn made from Somnacanth parts. Its tones can raise even the lowest of spirits.

name: Illusory Flute+
description: An enhanced Frilled Flute. Foes would do well to beware its deadly lullaby.

name: Nightmare Flute
description: A hunting horn filled with Somnacanth hate. Literally a monster's worst nightmare.

name: Illusory Flute
description: An enhanced Frilled Flute. Foes would do well to beware its deadly lullaby.

name: Nightmare Flute+
description: A hunting horn filled with Somnacanth hate. Literally a monster's worst nightmare.

name: Bloom Snow Flute
description: A hunting horn that looks like an Aurora Somnacanth hand. Plays cool music.

name: Bloom Snow Flute+
description: A hunting horn that looks like an Aurora Somnacanth hand. Plays cool music.

name: Flicker Blizzard Flute
description: A horn that plays a freezing lullaby, inviting all prey off into eternal slumber.

name: Iron Horn I
description: A musical weapon made from iron. Extremely simple in both form and function.

name: Metal Bagpipe I
description: A large hunting horn made of metal. Its sonorous tones give courage to listeners.

name: Wind Horn
description: Iron Horn's improved form. Despite its simplicity, it's suited to veteran hunters.

name: Great Bagpipe
description: An enhanced Metal Bagpipe, guaranteed to raise spirits with its sprightly tones.

name: Heavy Bagpipe I
description: A horn with a daunting number of parts. Hard to use but surely worth it.

name: Fortissimo
description: After multiple upgrades, the enhanced Heavy Bagpipes emit a beautiful, delicate sound.

name: Fortissimo+
description: After multiple upgrades, the enhanced Heavy Bagpipes emit a beautiful, delicate sound.

name: Rinforzato
description: This hunting horn is said to have belonged to a poet, who ended a war with a single song.

name: Rinforzato+
description: This hunting horn is said to have belonged to a poet, who ended a war with a single song.

name: Grundner Flap
description: A hunting horn made from the wing membrane of an Astalos. It echoes with mighty thunder.

name: Grundner Flap+
description: A hunting horn made from the wing membrane of an Astalos. It echoes with mighty thunder.

name: Grnlicht Flap
description: Only a solitary wyvern remained. It took to the heavens, leaving destruction in its wake.

name: Frostmoon Wailer
description: Hearing the icy hum of this flute is enough to freeze the hearts of the most compassionate hunters.

name: Frostmoon Wailer+
description: Hearing the icy hum of this flute is enough to freeze the hearts of the most compassionate hunters.

name: Harmonic Resonance
description: Resounds cold and merciless melodies. In turn, its prey offers a chorus of screams.

name: Hidden Harmonic I
description: An ebon horn. Inaudible to most, but used as a signal in the underworld.

name: Cry in the Night
description: The Hidden Harmonic's final form. Screams of demons in the night go unheard by man.

name: Horn of Deprivation
description: A horn as dark as the night. The souls it has consumed are agonized by emptiness.

name: Horn of Deprivation+
description: A horn as dark as the night. The souls it has consumed are agonized by emptiness.

name: Hidden Harmonic II
description: An ebon horn. Inaudible to most, but used as a signal in the underworld.

name: Pukei Bagpipe I
description: A horn made from Pukei-Pukei parts. The elastic materials provide great amplification.

name: Pukei Bagpipe II
description: A horn made from Pukei-Pukei parts. The elastic materials provide great amplification.

name: Avidya Harmonic
description: A weapon of darkness created by an ancient assassin. Its tone changes depending on who hears it.

name: Datura Lurr+
description: An enhanced Pukei Bagpipe. This horn produces truly kaleidoscopic melodies.

name: Datura Lurr
description: An enhanced Pukei Bagpipe. This horn produces truly kaleidoscopic melodies.

name: Datura Accelerando+
description: A flute made from the finest Pukei-Pukei materials; its music hastens toxic effects.

name: Flammenkornett I
description: This horn is imbued with an Anjanath's spirit, striking its listeners' hearts.

name: Datura Accelerando
description: A flute made from the finest Pukei-Pukei materials; its music hastens toxic effects.

name: Flammenkornett II
description: This horn is imbued with an Anjanath's spirit, striking its listeners' hearts.

name: Forte Flammenkornett
description: An enhanced Flammenkornett that fans the flames of its audience's fighting spirits.

name: Forte Flammenkornett+
description: An enhanced Flammenkornett that fans the flames of its audience's fighting spirits.

name: Horn of the Indomitable
description: The melodies of this hunting horn light a passion for combat in the hearts of all who hear it.

name: Horn of the Indomitable+
description: The melodies of this hunting horn light a passion for combat in the hearts of all who hear it.

name: Valkyrie Chordmaker I
description: A musical weapon made from Rathian parts. Functions as both a horn and a bell.

name: Valkyrie Chordmaker II
description: A musical weapon made from Rathian parts. Functions as both a horn and a bell.

name: Queen Chordmaker
description: Enhanced Valkyrie Chordmaker with a regal, lilting sound. Makes listeners feel alive.

name: Queen's Harmonium+
description: The earth shakes with glorious song, stirring spirits and hailing victory.

name: Rosenseele
description: This hunting horn emits a deadly melody evoking the anger and roar of an Espinas.

name: Rosengitarre
description: A horn that plays appealing, spiky musicsometimes going soft, sometimes hard.

name: Sandpipe I
description: A horn that resembles a Barroth's crown. Despite its appearance, it sounds sweet.

name: Rosengitarre+
description: A horn that plays appealing, spiky musicsometimes going soft, sometimes hard.

name: Sandpipe II
description: A horn that resembles a Barroth's crown. Despite its appearance, it sounds sweet.

name: Sandcrier
description: An enhanced Sandpipe. Wild passion breaks through its delicate form into its song.

name: Sandcrier+
description: An enhanced Sandpipe. Wild passion breaks through its delicate form into its song.

name: Sandscreecher
description: A harsh, yet heartrending tone redolent of the spirit and sorrow of the hunt.

name: Frog Flute I
description: A horn made from Tetranadon parts. Makes croaking sounds using the water inside it.

name: Sandscreecher+
description: A harsh, yet heartrending tone redolent of the spirit and sorrow of the hunt.

name: Frog Flute II
description: A horn made from Tetranadon parts. Makes croaking sounds using the water inside it.

name: Amphibia Allargando
description: An enhanced Frog Flute. Its roar can strengthen even the most seasoned fighter.

name: Amphibia Allargando+
description: An enhanced Frog Flute. Its roar can strengthen even the most seasoned fighter.

name: Amphibia Larghetto
description: This heavy, powerful horn is imbued with a fighting spirit, inspiring those who hear its call.

name: Amphibia Larghetto+
description: This heavy, powerful horn is imbued with a fighting spirit, inspiring those who hear its call.

name: Wind Thief Horn I
description: Bowl your enemies over with the Wind Thief Horn's pinwheel of sound!

name: Wind Thief Horn II
description: Bowl your enemies over with the Wind Thief Horn's pinwheel of sound!

name: Gale Horn+
description: An enhanced Wind Thief Horn. Powerful, but more popular for its colorful design.

name: Great Gale Horn
description: A beautifully whirling pinwheel that brings color to the battlefield.

name: Droth Drone I
description: A horn made of spongy Royal Ludroth parts. An amplifier blasts its song for miles.

name: Gale Horn
description: An enhanced Wind Thief Horn. Powerful, but more popular for its colorful design.

name: Droth Drone II
description: A horn made of spongy Royal Ludroth parts. An amplifier blasts its song for miles.

name: Droth Roar
description: An enhanced Droth Drone. An improved amplifier makes for a more powerful roar.

name: Droth Roar+
description: An enhanced Droth Drone. An improved amplifier makes for a more powerful roar.

name: Echoing Droth Roar
description: The cry of the Royal Ludroth is so powerful, it can cause the ocean to swell and rise.

name: Echoing Droth Roar+
description: The cry of the Royal Ludroth is so powerful, it can cause the ocean to swell and rise.

name: Golm Drum
description: The explosive sound of this Garangolm drum echoes to the heart of the listener.

name: Seismic Pauken
description: The intensifying beat of this drum is enough to shake even the enemies' resolve.

name: Golm Drum+
description: The explosive sound of this Garangolm drum echoes to the heart of the listener.

name: Hardened Bone Horn
description: The enhanced Bone Horn. Far more destructive, but also easier to use.

name: Bone Horn I
description: A hunting horn made of bone for novice hunters. People love its balanced features.

name: Bone Horn II
description: A hunting horn made of bone for novice hunters. People love its balanced features.

name: Hunter's Horn I
description: A high-performance horn suitable for beginners. Popular among hunters.

name: Native's Horn
description: An enhanced Hunter's Horn. Listeners have their natural instincts awakened.

name: Sonic Glass
description: Giant insect wings layered and formed into a hunting horn. Buzz-like tone.

name: Sonic Glass+
description: Giant insect wings layered and formed into a hunting horn. Buzz-like tone.

name: Glass Queen
description: Enhanced Sonic Glass. Its deafening roar can drown out the sound of a wyvern's wings.

name: Shell Castanet+
description: Blowing causes the claw to strike the shell. Features peculiar note characteristics.

name: Shell Castanet
description: Blowing causes the claw to strike the shell. Features peculiar note characteristics.

name: Colored Castanet
description: An upgraded Shell Castanet. It's capable of more powerful sounds and attacks.

name: Vadya Muse
description: A hunting horn forged from Seregios claws. The melody it creates drives its victims mad.

name: Allysyl Muse
description: The spirit of rebellion lives on in the enhanced form of the Vadya Muse.

name: Vadya Muse+
description: A hunting horn forged from Seregios claws. The melody it creates drives its victims mad.

name: Duo Horn II
description: Horn made of... Well, horn. Its intertwined shape produces a unique sound.

name: Duo Risoluto+
description: Shake the desert sands and strike fear into your foes with the roar of this horn.

name: Duo Risoluto
description: Shake the desert sands and strike fear into your foes with the roar of this horn.

name: Horned Tyrant's Horn
description: This curious horn's melodies are said to make even elder dragons tremble as they carry across the vast desert.

name: Duo Horn I
description: Horn made of... Well, horn. Its intertwined shape produces a unique sound.

name: Horned Tyrant's Horn+
description: This curious horn's melodies are said to make even elder dragons tremble as they carry across the vast desert.

name: Bull Grunt I
description: A hunting horn that uses Bullfango hide to give its sound a wild edge.

name: Feral Grunt
description: An enhanced Wild Grunt. Its call summons wild beasts from their forest homes.

name: Wild Grunt
description: An enhanced Bull Grunt. Its call summons wild beasts from their forest homes.

name: Feral Grunt+
description: An enhanced Wild Grunt. Its call summons wild beasts from their forest homes.

name: Barbarian Grunt
description: Once, in a great wildfire, this instrument's call guided forest beasts to safety.

name: Flame Feroce I
description: A horn made from Rathalos. When the webbing inside vibrates, sound is produced.

name: Flame Feroce II
description: A horn made from Rathalos. When the webbing inside vibrates, sound is produced.

name: Rathalos Feroce
description: An enhanced Flame Feroce, as strong as the King of the Skies himself.

name: Rathalos Feroce+
description: An enhanced Flame Feroce, as strong as the King of the Skies himself.

name: Ophelia's Grace
description: A piercing cry rang out in triumph as the mountain of bodies lay still at His Eminence's feet.

name: Kulu Mosso I
description: A hunting horn made from Kulu-Ya-Ku. Its odd whistle can be heard for miles.

name: Kulu Mosso II
description: A hunting horn made from Kulu-Ya-Ku. Its odd whistle can be heard for miles.

name: Kulu Grosso
description: Treat your enemies to a devastating recital with this enhanced Kulu Mosso.

name: Kulu Katolos Mosso
description: Crafted from Kulu-Ya-Ku materials, this hunting horn has a light, uplifting tone.

name: Kulu Grosso+
description: Treat your enemies to a devastating recital with this enhanced Kulu Mosso.

name: Khezu Horn I
description: Made to look like the mouth of a Khezu. You shouldn't leave it out when you sleep.

name: Khezu Flute
description: It's just...weird. There's no other way to describe the sound this thing makes.

name: Khezu Horn II
description: Made to look like the mouth of a Khezu. You shouldn't leave it out when you sleep.

name: Khezu Flute+
description: It's just...weird. There's no other way to describe the sound this thing makes.

name: Khezu Keen
description: This storied magic horn emits an ominous melody to trap prey, before slowly gulping it down.

name: Khezu Keen+
description: This storied magic horn emits an ominous melody to trap prey, before slowly gulping it down.

name: Vicello Nulo I
description: A cello-like horn made from Bnahabra. The skilled can make unique music with it.

name: Vicello Nulo II
description: A cello-like horn made from Bnahabra. The skilled can make unique music with it.

name: Vicello Nulo Black I
description: A cello-like weapon made of Bnahabra parts. Its melodies can silence even monsters.

name: Vicello Nulo Black II
description: A cello-like weapon made of Bnahabra parts. Its melodies can silence even monsters.

name: Vicello Unu
description: An enhanced Vicello Nulo. Uses insects to increase function and durability.

name: Vicello Kvar Black
description: A finely tuned black hunting horn. Its sober tone is said to calm wild wyvern herds.

name: Vicello Du Black
description: The black Vicello Nulo's improved form. Can calm even the most savage of beasts.

name: Vicello Nulo Green I
description: A cello-like weapon made of a Bnahabra. Uses a paralytic agent that immobilizes foes.

name: Vicello Nulo Green II
description: A cello-like weapon made of a Bnahabra. Uses a paralytic agent that immobilizes foes.

name: Vicello Unu Green
description: The green Vicello Nulo's enhanced form. It excretes a paralytic agent when hit.

description: The green Vicello Nulo's enhanced form. It excretes a paralytic agent when hit.

name: Vicello Tre Black
description: A finely tuned black hunting horn. Its sober tone is said to calm wild wyvern herds.

name: Vicello Tre Green
description: The green Vicello Du's enhanced form. It excretes a paralytic agent when hit.

name: Vicello Nulo White I
description: A cello-like weapon made of Bnahabra parts. Its cold body emits chilling tones.

name: Vicello Unu White
description: The white Vicello Nulo's enhanced form. Send chills up a spine, then break it.

name: Vicello Nulo White II
description: A cello-like weapon made of Bnahabra parts. Its cold body emits chilling tones.

name: Vicello Tre White
description: The white Vicello Du's enhanced form. Send chills up a spine, then break it.

name: Sinister Strum I
description: Come now, and set the stage for a grand performance with this demonic lute.

name: Sinister Strum II
description: Come now, and set the stage for a grand performance with this demonic lute.

name: Sinister Shadestrum
description: Set free this lute's peals of resentment, rancor, and earth-shattering rage!

name: Sinister Shadestrum+
description: Set free this lute's peals of resentment, rancor, and earth-shattering rage!

name: Mighty Souleraser
description: Hear the mournful melody played in repose of souls, and try to hide your fear.

name: Kummerklang
description: A sinister Hunting Horn capable of razing the earth if played by a wicked soul.

name: Devil's Lute
description: With the repose of souls ringing in your ears, azure flames cleanse your enmity.

name: Kummerklang+
description: A sinister Hunting Horn capable of razing the earth if played by a wicked soul.

name: Trauerklang
description: A jet-black horn which plays a song of destruction that chases away both hopes and fears.

name: Denden Daiko II
description: A hunting horn that calls storms with its first blast, and victory with the next.

name: Le Grgorien
description: A golden horn that turns despair into hope, playing a stirring song of survival.

name: Denden Daiko I
description: A hunting horn that calls storms with its first blast, and victory with the next.

name: Denden Doomsounder
description: The enhanced Denden Daiko bids the thunderclouds in the sky to cry victory.

name: Denden Delugesong
description: The final form of the Denden Daiko that beats to the sound of unbridled ruin.

name: Demonlord Djembe
description: The booming sound of this rousing, golden drum summons savage thunderclouds.

name: Denden Doomsounder+
description: The enhanced Denden Daiko bids the thunderclouds in the sky to cry victory.

name: Azure Elder Horn II
description: Let Ibushi's solitude swell unyielding over the land, and shake the stars above.

name: Azure Elder Horn I
description: Let Ibushi's solitude swell unyielding over the land, and shake the stars above.

name: Thunderbolt Horn I
description: A subtly beautiful horn. Its chilling sound strikes foes like a lightning bolt.

name: Abyssal Gale Horn
description: Imbued with the power of the Wind Serpent. Creates an eternal vortex of chaos.

name: Abyssal Storm Horn
description: Hear ye the Allmother's cry, and be swathed in a void of heavenly peace.

name: Skytremor Rumble
description: Growl at the heavens, thunder! Cries of rage that make even the gods tremor.

name: Rookslayer Drum I
description: The explosive rhythm of the Rookslayer drum torches vast plains and enemies alike.

name: Skytremor Typhoon
description: Howl at the heavens, wind! Cries of odium that make even the gods tremor.

name: Bazelreid Rookslayer
description: Shake the heavens above with the thunderous beat of the Bazelreid Rookslayer!

name: Rookslayer Drum II
description: The explosive rhythm of the Rookslayer drum torches vast plains and enemies alike.

name: Baselsium Rookslayer
description: Shake the heavens above with the thunderous beat of this upgraded Bazelreid Rookslayer.

name: Daora's Taus I
description: A horn fashioned after a beast of steel; its cold tones bewitch prey.

name: Teostra's Tiple I
description: An instrument of the Flame Emperor whose crimson timbre causes fire to dance forth.

name: Daora's Baphophone
description: An enhanced Daora's Taus. Capable of stealing souls with its chilling melody.

name: Daora's Baphophone+
description: An enhanced Daora's Taus. Capable of stealing souls with its chilling melody.

name: Daora's Diabassoon
description: This smooth, alluring beauty condemns foes to being sealed in eternal ice.

name: Teostra's Orphe+
description: The enhanced Teostra's Tiple. Raises dancing flames that turn people to ash.

name: Teostra's Musica
description: A legendary lute from a land of fire. Its rousing strains give courage to all.

name: Teostra's Orphe
description: The enhanced Teostra's Tiple. Raises dancing flames that turn people to ash.

name: Redwing Flute I
description: A hunting horn made from a Crimson Valstrax. Roars like the elder dragon itself.

name: Cursed Ocarina
description: The Blessed Ocarina's final form plays dreamy melodies that carry across the seas.

name: Blessed Ocarina I
description: Horn with a whimsical tone. Hearkens to designs from the western desert kingdom.

name: Reddnaught Ritmico
description: An enhanced Redwing Flute that shakes the stars and heavens with a booming roar.

name: Crimson Clearwing
description: An enhanced Redwing Flute that shakes the stars and heavens with a booming roar.

name: Abyssal Hollow
description: Fourteen terrors from the black abyss. The eighth was a pit to swallow all things.

name: Poison Fungasax I
description: A horn featuring poisonous mushrooms. In both hunting and music, improv is key.

name: Poison Fungasax II
description: A horn featuring poisonous mushrooms. In both hunting and music, improv is key.

name: Toxic Fungasax
description: The enhanced Poison Fungasax uses poison that makes even wyverns swing to the beat.

name: Toxic Fungasax+
description: The enhanced Poison Fungasax uses poison that makes even wyverns swing to the beat.

name: Magia Charm I
description: A hunting horn preferred by women. Its feminine tones echo across the battlefield.

name: Magia Charm III
description: A hunting horn preferred by women. Its feminine tones echo across the battlefield.

name: Magia Charm II
description: A hunting horn preferred by women. Its feminine tones echo across the battlefield.

name: Magia Charmbell
description: Due to popular demand, the Magia Charm has transformed into its enhanced form!

name: Magia Charmbell+
description: Due to popular demand, the Magia Charm has transformed into its enhanced form!

name: Bell of Laertes
description: This horn has been fully upgraded and strengthened! A must-have for female hunters!

name: Cornupion I
description: A hunting horn that houses a deadly neurotoxin. Lures its prey into a web of melody.

name: Cornupion II
description: A hunting horn that houses a deadly neurotoxin. Lures its prey into a web of melody.

name: Webbed Cornupion
description: The improved Cornupion. Plays the frightful melodies of a predator in pursuit.

name: Gossamer Cornupion
description: Plays a bewitching melody that ensnares and entangles its prey.

name: Hamlet's Horn
description: The improved Cornupion. Plays the frightful melodies of a predator in pursuit.

name: Grass Flute I
description: A horn that looks like a Bombadgy. This round boy is all the rage right now.

name: Grass Flute II
description: A horn that looks like a Bombadgy. This round boy is all the rage right now.

name: Bombadgy's Cry
description: This horn looks more like a toy than a weapon. Squeeze it. You know you want to.

name: Raccoon Dog Auldhorn
description: The finest materials and unrivalled texture give this instrument a unique timbre.

name: Bombadgy's Cry+
description: This horn looks more like a toy than a weapon. Squeeze it. You know you want to.

name: Royal Order's Horn
description: A hunting horn used by knights of the Order. Only those who have proven their strength may wield it.

name: Antique Machina HH
description: A hunting horn of emerald and gold furnished with a mechanism utilizing afflicted energy.

name: Royal Order's Horn+
description: A hunting horn used by knights of the Order. Only those who have proven their strength may wield it.

name: Rampage Agitato II
